Atmospheres.Name: None/thin
Atmospheres.Description: This planet is airless, or it’s atmosphere is so thin as to be useless for humans.

Atmospheres.Name: Toxic
Atmospheres.Description: This planet’s atmosphere is not compatible with human life. Exploring this place will require a sealed environment or breathing apparatus. Otherwise, survival is measured in minutes.

Atmospheres.Name: Corrosive
Atmospheres.Description: This planet’s atmosphere is deadly to humans. As a bonus, it can damage exposed skin, materials, and metals over time.

Atmospheres.Name: Marginal
Atmospheres.Description: It’s unhealthy to breathe this planet’s atmosphere for more than a few hours at a time.

Atmospheres.Name: Breathable
Atmospheres.Description: This atmosphere is not perfect, but it’s good enough to sustain human life.

Atmospheres.Name: Ideal
Atmospheres.Description: This planet’s atmosphere is ideally suited to human life. It’s literally a breath of fresh air.
